meanings.definition: To change the direction or position of something
meanings.sent1: She reorientates the map to face north.
meanings.sent2: He reorientates the chair to get a better view.
meanings.sent3: The confused cat reorientates itself after spinning in circles.
meanings.sent4: The dancer reorientates her body gracefully mid-performance.
meanings.sent5: The compass needle reorientates itself towards magnetic north.

meanings.definition: To adjust or adapt to a new situation or environment
meanings.sent1: He reorientates his study habits for the new semester.
meanings.sent2: She reorientates her mindset to embrace change.
meanings.sent3: The robot reorientates its sensors to avoid obstacles.
meanings.sent4: The plant reorientates its leaves towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The team reorientates their strategy for the upcoming match.
